lead_paragraph: Mitsubishi remained in America after the earthquakes and tsunami of 2011 in Japan, and now its new-car sales are growing, helped by affordable models.

headline.print_headline: Mitsubishi Grabs a Shiny Sliver of the American Market
headline.main: Mitsubishi Grabs a Shiny Sliver of the American Market

snippet: Mitsubishi remained in America after the earthquakes and tsunami of 2011 in Japan, and now its new-car sales are growing, helped by affordable models.
abstract: Wheels column; Mitsubishi Motors reports vehicle sales in America rose despite tarnishing of manufacturer’s image due to gas-mileage cheating scandal in Japan; analysts say domestic buyers appear to care more about carmaker’s fleet of affordably priced models.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks
